thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com
thread.title: Mrs Debra Johnson
thread.title_full: DHgate 的点评人 Mrs Debra Johnson

author: Mrs Debra Johnson
title: Mrs Debra Johnson
text: I have had just a few minor problems but the sellers are fast to take care of anything that arises, My only real disappointment was with one seller that insisted they had shipped their items but in fact never did until I insisted they research it, When they finally did, they shipped them but ended up taking a very long time because of their not trying to check into for me when I asked. The shipment ended up taking 45 days to receive. Other than that, the sellers are very quick to take care of any problems.
